title: Table 158 - Row 4
clause_text: Sr. No. (1): 8 | Occupancy (2): Hospitals and Medical Institutions | Parking Space required (3): One parking space for every 150-sq.m of total floor area, except that it would be one parking space for every 600-sq.m of the total floor area in the case of Govt. and Municipal hospitals and Medical institutions. In addition, one parks space for ambulance parking measuring 10 m x 4 m for hospitals or medical institutions with bed strength of 100 or more.

values: One parking space for every 150-sq.m of total floor area, except that it would be one parking space for every 600-sq.m of the total floor area in the case of Govt. and Municipal hospitals and Medical institutions. In addition, one parks space for ambulance parking measuring 10 m x 4 m for hospitals or medical institutions with bed strength of 100 or more.
